title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 31 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year

Inflation rate compared to previous year is rapidly decreasing from 1994 to 1997, rapidly increasing from 1997 to 1999, rapidly decreasing from 1999 to 2000, roughly constant from 2000 to 2001, slightly decreasing from 2001 to 2002, roughly constant from 2002 to 2003, slightly decreasing from 2003 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2005, slightly decreasing from 2005 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2007, gradually increasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually decreasing from 2009 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2014, rapidly increasing from 2014 to 2015, rapidly decreasing from 2015 to 2018, rapidly increasing from 2018 to 2019, slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1995 and 1996.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 307.63 was recorded at Year 1994
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 2.88 was recorded at Year 2018
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 31 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2001 to 2007.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2020.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2020 to 2024.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2015.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2007 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 1997 to 2001.
